      static int PathFindToTarget(int selfpos_y, int selfpos_x, int targetpos_y, int targetpos_x, boolean[][] map)
      Pathfinds shortest route to target, returns direction in witch target should move Uses Breadth-First-Search

    • Method Detail

      • PathFindToTarget

        public static int PathFindToTarget(int selfpos_y,
                                   int selfpos_x,
                                   int targetpos_y,
                                   int targetpos_x,
                                   boolean[][] map)
        Pathfinds shortest route to target, returns direction in witch target should move Uses Breadth-First-Search
        Parameters:
        self_pos - Self position [0]-y [1]-x
        target_pos - Targets position [0]-y [1]-x
        map - Map held in a boolean array - map[y][x]
        Returns:
        Movement direction 0 - up 1 - right 2 - down 3 - left 4 - no_path
